GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.35 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
drivers/base/node.c: fix compaction sysfs file leak

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit d8a5bdc767f17281da648555cdbd286f98fd98ee, it was introduced in version v2.6.35 by commit ed4a6d7f0676db50b5023cc01f6cda82a2f2a307. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drivers/base/node.c: fix compaction sysfs file leak
